order.title: Order
order.description: Represents a customer's order for a service plan.

planName.description: The name of the plan being purchased.

amount.description: The price of the order in USD.

currency.description: The currency of the order (e.g., USD).

status.description: The current status of the order.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the order was created.

paidAt.description: Timestamp when the order was paid.

oxapayTrackId.description: The unique tracking ID from OxaPay.
